title: VR-Based Chemistry Lab Education: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Application of VR simulations in environments with restricted access to experimental equipment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic chemistry experiments (mixing, measuring, observing) in a VR environment with 80% accuracy while adhering to safety protocols.
Learners can analyze virtual experimental data and write a report explaining chemical reaction mechanisms.
Learners can identify at least three errors in the VR experiment process and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
